message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this amazing product that you've expressed interest in. I'm asking for $180 for it. It's a great deal, considering its value.
Hello Alice, thank you for offering the product. I appreciate the value of the item, but I believe we can reach an agreement closer to my budget. Would you consider $140 for the product?
Bob, I understand your budget constraints.  I'm willing to come down to $160, which is still a good deal for both of us. Let's try to make this work!
Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering my budget, I would like to propose a price of $150 for the product.
